Victoria Adukwei Bulley bụ onye Ghana na-ede uri a mụrụ na obodo Britain.
Bulley bụ onye obodo Ghana, amụrụ ma zụlite ya na Essex, dị naEngland
N'afọ 2019, e nyere ya agụmakwụkwọ na akwughi ugwo Techne maka ọrụ dọkịta na Royal Holloway, Mahadum nke London.

Ndị mbiputa akwụkwọ ana kpo Akashic Books bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya bu Girl B nke etinye kwaara na nchikota ndị agburu-ọhuru na-ede uri nke Afrịka: A Chapbook Box Set (ISBN 9781617755408) Karen McCarthy Woolf kporo ya 'mpụta mbụ na-achọgharị, na-eche echiche na nke na-atọ ụtọ nwayọ
O mepụtara ọrụ Mother Tongues intergenerational, ebe ndị na-ede uri na nne ha na-arụkọ ọrụ iji sụgharịa uri ha n'asụsụ nne ha.
Bulley meriri Eric Gregory Award nke afọ 2018.
Eliot Prize ma merie Folio Prize maka uri nke afọ.
